citations.narrative:
There is a bag of feed being stored in the animal room with the open end folded over. At the time of the inspection, there
is a roach present inside the feed bag and in contact with the feed. The facility representative discarded the bag during
the inspection.
Inadequate food storage can lead to contamination of food by pests and impact the quality of the feed. Supplies of food
and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, molding, or
contamination by vermin.
To be corrected by May 11, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There is a bag of feed being stored in the animal room with the open end folded over. At the time of the inspection, there 
is a roach present inside the feed bag and in contact with the feed. The facility representative discarded the bag during 
the inspection.  
Inadequate food storage can lead to contamination of food by pests and impact the quality of the feed. Supplies of food 
and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, molding, or 
contamination by vermin.  
To be corrected by May 11, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
